main: ^Emergency response protocol initiated. Droid replication complete. Task: neutralize hostile threat to civilians.
Main2: ^Allow me to introduce myself: I am D.O.R.A.I, the Defense Opperative Replicating AI. I am located in your security hubs computer system and - through me - you may customise your software.
^For now, I will provide you with what information I can during your first run.
